Bluetooth beacons settings MQTT server settings MQTT templates Interface settings Notification settings Beacon state topic Beacon state message Master topic Master enter message Master exit message Track topic Track message Show log on main screen Vibrate on events Pause between scans in background Time period between scanning cycles. Used when the app is running in the background.\nValid range: 0 … 55000ms. Default: 8000ms Scan duration Time period to scan. Usually set to 3 times beacon’s advertising interval.\nValid range: 500 … 5000ms. Default: 2000ms Inactive timeout Time to retain current master role. Used when the app is not actively receiving advertising packets. Usually set to half the exit timeout value.\nValid range: 15000 … 300000ms. Default: 90000ms Exit timeout Send exit message when the app is not actively receiving advertising packets.\nValid range: 30000 … 600000ms. Default: 180000ms Concurrent hysteresis factor Prevents the flapping of master status between equidistance beacons. To pick up the master role a beacon must be X times closer than the current master beacon.\nValid range: 1.0 … 5. Default: 1.5 The value should be in range of %s Tokens available:\n\t• Beacon’s name - %beacon%\n\t• Beacon’s group: - %group%\n\t• Beacon’s tag - %tag%\n\t• Beacon’s state: - %state%\n\t• Phone’s MAC address: - %mac% Tokens available:\n\t• Beacon’s name - %beacon%\n\t• Beacon’s group: - %group%\n\t• Beacon’s tag - %tag%\n\t• Beacon’s state: - %state%\n\t• Phone’s MAC address: - %mac%\n\t• Beacon’s RSSI (dBm) - %rssi%\n\t• Distance to beacon (meters): - %distance%\n Add beacon> New beacons have not been found yet.\n\nYou can add a beacon manually\nby clicking the plus button. Add beacon manually Restart scan m UUID • %1$s Major • %1$s Minor • %1$s About Beacon MQTT> The documentation, typical usecases, list of known issues are available on a project\'s homepage. Like this app? Rate it in Google Play. Feedback Acknowledgments Many thanks to Simon Bunn, Ronald Dehuysser, Cyn, Philip and others who helped me make Beacon MQTT better. Homepage Beacon MQTT is the simple Android app for presence detection of a person. Beacons have a known location. When an app detects or loses a beacon, it sends a MQTT message to home automation system.\n\nPlease, note the beacon detection is a time critical process. You have to disable any activity restrictions for Beacon MQTT in your Android. Without this you will have lots of false beacon losses. There are some breaking changes. Not all settings can be converted automatically. \n\nPlease check on your settings. This app needs location access Please grant location access so this app can detect beacons in the background. Since location access has not been granted, this app will not be able to discover beacons when in the background. Please enable bluetooth in settings and restart this application.
